requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 5.15.103 or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor or later
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 6.1.20 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Processor or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB or better
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
